comments.en:
HP LaserJet (PCL drivers) work OK for small print files, but give "Memory full" error messages on large print jobs, even at low resolution.

The device does all jobs correctly with the "hl7x0" driver.

The memory is upgradable; We do not know if it is standard memory or a funky module.

Brother publishes proprietary Linux drivers for CUPS and LPD for most of their laser printers and multi-function devices, including SANE drivers for the scanners. They can be downloaded free of charge on their Linux driver page.
